    I am a postdoctoral researcher working with Li Cheng at the Vision and Learning Lab, University of Alberta, Canada. My research focuses on shape/scene generation, editing, composition, arrangement, and reconstruction. Previously, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the GrUVi Lab, Simon Fraser University, where I worked with Hao (Richard) Zhang on compositional modeling and graphics. I received my Ph.D. from the University of Science and Technology of China under the supervision of Nenghai Yu and Weiming Zhang.
